hadiths.text: A hadith like this has been narrated by Mis'ar on the authority of al-Hakam, but in the hadith transmitted by Mis'ar these words are not found:" Should I not offer you a present?

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ عَلَى النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم بَعْدَ التَّشَهُّدِ
chapter.eng-name: Sending Salat Upon The Prophet (ﷺ) After The Tashah-hud
